description:
Isotherm describing adsorption or desorption of the sample component on the surface of the stationary phase from the mobile phase.
CHMO: 0001992
IUPAC: AT06934

temperature.description:
temperature at which the measurement was performed (short form for thermodynamic, Celsius or Fahrenheit temperature)
IUPAC: T06261
temperature.title: temperature

derivedProperties.description: Properties derived from the analysis of an isotherm
derivedProperties.title: derivedProperties

method.description: Measurement principle with which the gas adsorption/desorption isotherm was measured.
method.title: method

sampleMass.description:
Mass of sample used in the measurement
IUPAC: M03709
sampleMass.title: sampleMass

instrument.description: Instrument that was used to perform the measurement
instrument.title: instrument

remarks.description: String with markup in HTML syntax.
remarks.title: remarks

dataSource.description: Description of the source of the data
dataSource.title: dataSource

value.description: The value of the quantitative value or property value node.
value.title: value

minValue.description: The lower value of some characteristic or property.
minValue.title: minValue

maxValue.description: The upper value of some characteristic or property.
maxValue.title: maxValue

saturationPressure.description:
The pressure exerted by a pure substance (at a given temperature) in a system containing only the vapour and condensed phase (liquid or solid) of the substance.
IUPAC: S05479
saturationPressure.title: saturationPressure

Adsorptive.description:
The material that is present in one or other (or both) of the bulk phases and capable of being adsorbed.
IUPAC: A00166
Adsorptive.title: Adsorptive

molarFraction.description:
Amount of a constituent divided by the total amount of all constituents in the mixture. It is also called mole fraction. Amount fraction is equal to the number fraction: the number of entities of one constituent divided by the total number of entities in the mixture.
IUPAC: A00296
molarFraction.title: molarFraction

description.description: String with markup in HTML syntax.
description.title: description

purity.description:
mass fraction purity calculated as (mass pure product) / (mass impure product)
or concentration of a dissolved species
purity.title: purity

iupac.description: If true, then name is IUPAC name
iupac.title: iupac

language.description: language of the name, indicated using the [ISO 2-letter code](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2)
language.title: language

DerivedIsothermProperties.description: Properties derived from the analysis of an isotherm
DerivedIsothermProperties.title: DerivedIsothermProperties

IsothermJCAMP.description: Defines the required columns in an isotherm JCAMP file
IsothermJCAMP.title: IsothermJCAMP

columns.description: specifies the columns and their abbreviations
columns.title: columns

dataClass.description: Specifies the data class that is used for the labeled data records in the JCAMP
dataClass.title: dataClass

filepath.description: Path to the file in the database
filepath.title: filepath

unit.description: Unit of the data in the column
unit.title: unit

variableType.description: variable type, used to indicate whether the variable was changed in an experiment via the instrument/experimentator (e.g., the pressure for isotherms or the angle for xray diffraction) for if the variable depends on the changed variable
variableType.title: variableType

Instrument.description:
The instrument with which a spectrum was measured.
CHMO: 0000998
Instrument.title: Instrument

manufacturer.description: The name of the instrument manufacturer
manufacturer.title: manufacturer

serialNumber.description: The INTERNAL serial number of the instrument, e.g., the inventory number of the instrument in a university
serialNumber.title: serialNumber

sku.description: Stock Keeping Unit (SKU), i.e. a merchant-specific identifier for a product or service, or the product to which the offer refers.
sku.title: sku

software.description: The name of the software and the version number
software.title: software

location.description: Describes the location of some object.
location.title: location

Location.description: Describes the location of some object.
Location.title: Location

building.description: Name or code of the building
building.title: building

room.description: Name or code of the room in which the object is localized
room.title: room

code.description: Internal code that is used to identify the location
code.title: code

uuid.description: the UUID of the data in some other database, for example, the UUID of the node of the object in AiiDAlab
uuid.title: uuid

doi.description: Digital object identifier of the source object
doi.title: doi
